descriptionlist.description: This item has and always will be free. #FuckHavocImNotPayingForThemes
I also suggest using Snowboard for this theme, if possible.
Behold! The greatest Windows 10 theme you'll ever find for your device!

This is my first big project, it's essentially a pre-2016 Windows 10 theme,
designed to look like those monochromatic icons from back then.

screenshot.description: Fully compatible with your tweak manager!

changelog.change: It's got a customized calendar icon
It's also got a customized clock icon, but i can't seem to make it automatic.
